Moran Colorado area...I am from Trumbull, Connecticut and have notice alot of reports in that area too. thanks for letting me report this I am truthful with this report...for some reason I draw the marks and implant sights all thru the years and the dates and the drawings ,but have always distroyed them...I didn't know whom to give them too
